articles.title: Convincing Twitter 'quote tweet' phone scam targets bank customers

title_detail.value: Convincing Twitter 'quote tweet' phone scam targets bank customers

articles.author: Ax Sharma
articles.summary: A convincing Twitter scam is targeting bank customers by abusing the quote-tweets feature, as observed by BleepingComputer. The scam preys on customers tweeting to their banks—such as to raise a complaints. But these customers instead receive a reply from the scammer, via a quote-tweet, urging them to call the scammer's "helpline." [...]

summary_detail.value: A convincing Twitter scam is targeting bank customers by abusing the quote-tweets feature, as observed by BleepingComputer. The scam preys on customers tweeting to their banks—such as to raise a complaints. But these customers instead receive a reply from the scammer, via a quote-tweet, urging them to call the scammer's "helpline." [...]

articles.title: Microsoft support 'cracks' Windows for customer after activation fails

title_detail.value: Microsoft support 'cracks' Windows for customer after activation fails

articles.author: Ax Sharma
articles.summary: In an unexpected twist, a Microsoft support engineer resorted to running an unofficial 'crack' on a customer's Windows PC after a genuine copy of the operating system failed to activate normally. It seems, this isn't the first time either that a Microsoft support professional has employed such workarounds. [...]

summary_detail.value: In an unexpected twist, a Microsoft support engineer resorted to running an unofficial 'crack' on a customer's Windows PC after a genuine copy of the operating system failed to activate normally.
